root.name: Surgeon Simulator 2013
root.description: OverviewSurgeon Simulator 2013 first started out as a Global Game Jam entree made in only 48 hours. After the game went viral the developers decided to make a full version of the game, adding more levels and releasing it on Steam.LevelsThere are three types of operations: Heart transplant, Kidney transplant, and Brain transplant. Each of these levels has an Ambulance variant where players perform surgery on Bob in the back of a speeding vehicle. After the main six operations are completed, a secret level will be unlocked that can be accessed by inserting the floppy disk titled "???" into the computer.System RequirementsPCMinimumOS:Windows XPProcessor:2.0 GHzMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:Nvidia Geforce 7800 GT or betterDirectX®:9.0Hard Drive:500 MB HD spaceSound:DirectX9.0 compatible sound cardAdditional:Requires keyboard.
